divs: sighting detailsleft work at 18:45 headed to subway for dinner as i was headed home back towards my work i saw what appeared to be space junk but then i thought it was street lights until i started to follow these lights. and realised they were a good 20km out of the city i live in. its a dry open treeless area for miles. saw the orbs in darkest and noticed them to be of an orange appearance and the orbs were stationary. they were roughly around 1200ft in the air give or take from my postion at about 5km away from me. they were appearing in random formation at times 3 or 2 then none then 1 to 3. there was no mist, fire, glow, smoke, flame or sparks. just 3 clear circular orange orbs. they didnt move erratically they just phased in and out. this carried on for a good 30minutes. i do have some film of this event. its on my mobile so not the greatest quality. i also informed my grandmother and she witnessed this event. the orbs had completely gone by the time i checked again, which was a good 30minutes later. i worked out as many theories as possible for this event to be explained rationally. but the pure height of these orbs ruled out the possiblity of a man made light source, the fact that they randomly appeared in the sky and were suspended in mid air neither moving left or right just purly suspended in the air, makes me believe it was not an aircraft or helicopter and there was no sounds, the night was very quiet with only traffic on the rare occassion the temperature was around 18 degrees a rather cool night with no cloud cover with open skys. im an industrial electrican in my opinion it wasnt a man made light source. also fire ruled out becuase of its colour and the way it appeared and dissapeared. maybe you or your team could come up with a solution or have others got any hard evidence to what it could of been since this is very unusual. finally about two days before this night a place called kadine about 300km away from whyalla also had similar appearing orbs and appariently many towns people saw it. reguards [cms\tg\pid]. please email me at [cms\tg\pid]
trends: There have been no other sightings in Whyalla
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Orange orb 3 of them randomly appearing at times one or two to zero random intervals
